resources.string: Primary Cardmember\'s Social Security Number (Last 4 Digits)
You have entered invalid information. Carefully review your information and please try again.

As a Sam\'s Club Discover Cardmember, you cannot register for the Account Center access at Discovercard.com. To manage your account you may register at the Sam\'s Club Web Site. Please contact customer service at 1–866–221–1126 for more information.
This is a 16–digit number starting with 6011. Do not include spaces or hyphens.
6–16 characters can contain most special characters except: (\"), (\'), (\\) and spaces.
8–32 characters. At least one number. Case sensitive. Special characters can be used.
You\'ll be sent an email confirming your online account registration.
User ID and password must not be the same.
User ID is already in use. Please choose another one.
This is the unused portion of your credit line. Certain pending transactions might affect the available balance you see displayed here.

If we do not receive your minimum payment by the date listed above, you may have to pay a late fee of up to $35.00 and your purchase and balance transfer APRs for new transactions may be increased up to the Penalty APR of 15.99% variable.
Some of our web site features are unavailable at this time. We sincerely apologize for this temporary inconvenience and are working to resolve the issue.
